title: [SKIN] Almost-Prom King Amumu
body:
On the picture of the skin, the bandages on his body are black, but ingame they are still green.
Not sure if this happens to anyone else.

replies.body:
Hey KFC Overlord,

This is working as intended. The lighting in the splash art makes the bandages appear darker than they actually are in game.  More recently, we've been working to better align skins and their splash.

Does this mean my prayers for Junkyard Trundle will finally be answered? (I don't own the skin nor want it, but as an artist it greatly offends me on how vastly different it is. Plus, the in-game model would look sweet as a splash art)
Junkyard {{champion:48}}  is my second favorite {{champion:48}}  skin. The fact this his splash looks nothing like the character model is pretty ridiculous.

To clarify, I'm referring to the skins that are upcoming.

 We do realize there are still some skin splashes that aren't great, and as you've seen, we've been slowly but surely updating them. Unfortunately, I don't have any information as to if Junkyard Trundle is on the list or not.
Hey, better late than never right? Least you've been slowly churning them out. The new splash arts look very nice, props to the splash art team (if there is one but I imagine there is?)
Thanks! Yup, we do have a team dedicated to splash!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=kjEtBqrP,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-09T00:12:45.209+0000)
>
> Thanks! Yup, we do have a team dedicated to splash!

http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/June_2011/2011_06_24_skin_sale/PromQueenAnnie_and_AlmostPromKingAmumu_1.jpg

The bandages look very black in this offical photo

This is a pretty old screenshot, it was taken on the old Summoner's Rift.

Earlier in the year we did a ton of texture rebalances, and Almost Prom King Amumu was one of the skins among many that were updated. 

This is what the current model should look like - 

http://noobabble.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Almost-Prom-King-Amumu.png
If you think that is horrid look at Trundle's "Lil' Slugger Skin" and prepare to be truly horrified.
